// frontend/src/pages/home/ui/catalog/ui/CatalogNav.jsx
import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{categoryAPI}from'../../../../../shared/services/api';import CatalogNavItem from'../../../../../features/catalog/ui/CatalogNavItem';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CatalogNav=_ref=>{let{styles=''}=_ref;const[categories,setCategories]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{loadCategories();},[]);const loadCategories=async()=>{try{const response=await categoryAPI.getCategories();setCategories(response.data.categories);}catch(error){console.error('Error loading categories:',error);setError('Ошибка загрузки категорий');}};const handleCardClick=id=>{navigate(`/nomenclature/${id}`);};if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-red-500",children:error});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`flex flex-col bg-white p-5 rounded-lg min-w-64 shadow-lg ${styles}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"space-y-[10px]",children:categories.map(category=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>handleCardClick(category.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CatalogNavItem,{title:category.name})},category.id))})});};export default CatalogNav;
